message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. However, I am only able to pay up to $8000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your honesty about your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $11000. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
